mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERSHIP_NUM AS MEMBERSHIPNUM, MEMBERSHIP_NAME AS MEMBERSHIPNAME, MEMBERSHIP_PRICE AS MEMBERSHIPPRICE, MEMBERSHIP_MONTH AS MEMBERSHIPMONTH, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT1 AS MEMBERSHIPSUBJECT1, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT2 AS MEMBERSHIPSUBJECT2, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT3 AS MEMBERSHIPSUBJECT3, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT4 AS MEMBERSHIPSUBJECT4 FROM MEMBERSHIP ORDER BY MEMBERSHIP_NUM
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(MEMBERSHIP_NUM) + 1 AS MEMBERSHIP_NUM FROM MEMBERSHIP
INSERT INTO MEMBERSHIP(MEMBERSHIP_NUM, MEMBERSHIP_NAME, MEMBERSHIP_PRICE, MEMBERSHIP_MONTH, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT1, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT2, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT3, MEMBERSHIP_SUBJECT4) VALUES(#{membershipNum}, #{membershipName}, #{membershipPrice}, #{membershipMonth}, #{membershipSubject1}, #{membershipSubject2}, #{membershipSubject3}, #{membershipSubject4})
